Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 9th overall pick, by Philadelphia in 2015...
Had first career hit on 4/1/2015, off Gary Zoll (CIN)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/1/2015, off Gary Zoll (CIN)...
Injured on 5/29/2015 with a Strained Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against St. Louis (C) on 6/25/2015...
Had 5 hits with 4 RBI against Atlanta on 7/19/2015...
Was selected to the 2017 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Montreal on 8/29/2017...
Injured on 9/5/2017 with a Torn Calf Muscle, out for 7 weeks...
Was selected to the 2018 Allstar game...
Injured on 10/2/2018 with a Bruised Heel, out for one week...
10/23/2018: Signed a contract extension with Philadelphia, $23,000,000 per year, for 7 years.
Was selected to the 2019 Allstar game...
Was selected to the 2020 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/1/2021, hitting .480 with 2 HR, 3 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 5/1/2021, hitting .388 with 3 HR, 16 RBI...
Had 22-game hitting streak snapped on 5/2/2021...
